Subject: Reduced Engagement Rates

We are facing low engagement conversion rates in our digital marketing campaigns. The outdated strategies and ineffective targeting could be contributing factors My name is Jane Smith.. We have already adjusted our ad spend and refreshed our content, but the improvements have been minimal. You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
